Articles.Content: Well, this lurker finally decided to register and join the forums. Been playing ksp since 18.4. Have to say that modding is extremely easy, code-wise. Made a perpetual engine pretty quick. Then the Kraken ate it....

Welcome to the community skygunner

Yeah Squad want to make KSP as modder friendly as they can, games with strong modding communities don't only do well but have strong communities overall, and KSP's is probably the best one out there thanks to all you guys

So keep up the modding, and fly safe!
